action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of National Youth Justice Action Month. It also acknowledges that the collateral consequences normally applied in the adult criminal justice system should not automatically apply to youth who are arrested for crimes before the age of 18.
